official.headline: Council Affirms Clarity
official.anchor_line: The Council has released new details on the recent BCI disruption, promising a transparent review and stability in services.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s trusted processes ensure accountability and continuous system improvement for all residents.

underground.headline: Halden Truth Divide
underground.anchor_line: Council factions are rewriting Halden's last days—citizens now pick sides as the BCI’s failures spark public doubt.
underground.contextual_reframing: Official 'transparency' just means more propaganda—every camp blames the other while the cracks in the system keep growing.
